DOC.brief_title: Postoperative Pain After Ambulatory Arthroscopic Shoulder Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: This study prospective cohort 6 month follow-up . Patients receive 5 questionnaire ( preoperatively , 24 hour , 1 week , 3 month , 6 month , 1 2 year surgery ) . The questionnaire contain question : - Preoperative shoulder pain ( type , intensity duration ) - Preoperative pain area besides shoulder - Brief Pain Inventory ( BPI ) - Western Ontario Rotator Cuff Index ( WORC ) - Single Assessment Numeric Evaluation ( SANE ) - 3 validated physiological questionnaire : - State Trait Anxiety ( STAI ) - Pain Catastrophizing Scale ( PCS ) - Hospital Anxiety Depression Scale ( HADS ) In addition cold pressor test perform day surgery test patient ' threshold ability repress pain .
